sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>GEt Property in JSON</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = gs.getProperty('day.in.milli.seconds'); grr = JSON.parse(gr); grrr = grr['daysinMilli']; gs.print(grrr);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-12-26 13:22:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>48aad39647db3550020ba9f8536d43d8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>GEt Property in JSON</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_48aad39647db3550020ba9f8536d43d8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-12-26 13:22:40</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
